author: andrew_cleal
title: Really nice set
review: This is a really nice little set. I like the addition of the red base plate in the caravan giving a streamlined feel. Make sure your set has correct hollow front screen on car rather than just a transparent slope brick.

author: Niki124
title: Better for parts as I recall
review:
This was another second-hand set which was built once, only to be dismantled and not rebuilt. Once you know the fun and playability of minifigures, there was no going back. This car-and-caravan set therefore was something of a disappointment in itself, having no way for minifigures to ride in the car, or indeed enter the caravan (I've just checked the brick inventory and it confirmed my suspicion that there was no door to the caravan). 

The bricks were versatile enough to be used elsewhere, and this is the only set I encountered which featured a hollow one-brick-high sloping windscreen, as opposed to the two-bricks-high version which became standard. However, if it had not been for this website, I might never have remembered that we actually had this as a set, rather than as another collection of bricks.
